title: How to write effective sentences in my English essay - Quora

response.answer_text: Stick to a single subject+verb patternRun-on sentences are ugly.The best length of the sentence is the one that can be read with one breath.Cut off dead wood. Every word should work, not decorate.Prefer fronted attributesNo adjectives of emotional assessment.This is just a first-aid kit.
